introSection.subtitle: I miss you more than I remember you
introSection.bottomText: really wish we could still work together

messageSection.title: Work Bestie Memories
messages: Sometimes we forget to thank the people who make our life better just by being in it, so thank you for being you.
When you pull up at work on Monday 8th and remember your work bestie isn't here anymore.
Sometimes we forget to thank the people who make our life better just by being in it, so thank you for being you. üí´

smiskiSection.title: Trust & Hope
smiskiSection.message: We don't build trust by offering help, we build trust by asking for it

labubuSection.title: Keep Swinging Forward
messages: Life is like a pendulum, it swings back and forth, but it always finds its balance.
Just like this little Labubu, keep moving forward with grace and joy.

gallerySection.title: What's Meant For You
messages: You know they say what's meant for you will find you whether it's love or dream or the promise of a brand new day.
And I hope good things find you friend.
I like that saying because it gives me hope and I think it's really important. Have a good day friend.

outroSection.title: Thank You
messages: Sometimes it's not where you work, it's who you work with that makes a job worth going to everyday.
We all have that one friend from your old job/project, that we really wish we still work with...
Embarrassment is an underexplored emotion. Go out there and make a fool of yourself.
